thread.title: Ocean Knight wins Belmont feature
thread.title_full: Ocean Knight wins Belmont feature - Yahoo Sports

author: yahoo
title: Ocean Knight wins Belmont feature
text:
Done NEW YORK (AP) -- Heavily favored Ocean Knight held off Noble Moon by a head Friday in the $80,000 allowance feature at Belmont Park.
The 1-2 choice trained by Kiaran McLaughlin and ridden by Irad Ortiz Jr. prevailed for his third win in five starts. The 3-year-old colt ran a mile in 1:35.16 over the fast track, paying $3, $2.60 and $2.10.
Noble Moon returned $4.50 and $3.30, and Strong Stipulation paid $5.90 to show.
Sports & Recreation Kiaran McLaughlin   38052/85227   3934/5000   2700/4545
